metadata.title: CVE-2019-20053 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the canUnpackfunction in p_mach.cpp in UPX 3.95 via a crafted Mach-O file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
